issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: HIVE-5755 removed hive-unit from the itests pom and it should not have been removed.
fields.summary: Add hive-unit back to itests pom

comments.body: Assuming tests comeback green, can I get a +1 [~prasadm] [~ashutoshc]?

[~brocknoland] I ran into compilation error in my setup y'day. Looks like it needs HBase dependencies in hive-unit/pom.xml,  similar to qtest and other poms that were updated as part of HIVE-5755. I was able to compile and run test with hadoop-1 profile, though I didn't run the full set.
will try it out the full set with both profiles in my setup later today and let you know.
Thanks Prasad!! If adding hive-unit back doesn't affect hadoop-1 then I think we should commit this change and fix hadoop-2 in a separate ticket.

{color:red}Overall{color}: -1 no tests executed

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12617572/HIVE-5981.patch
